thread.title: VMI basketball team picked to finish last last in Southern Conference
thread.title_full: VMI basketball team picked to finish last last in Southern Conference

title: VMI basketball team picked to finish last last in Southern Conference
text:
VMI basketball team picked to finish last last in Southern Conference POSTED: 05:44 PM EDT Oct 22, 2015 Large Text SPARTANBURG, S.C. (AP) - 
Chattanooga is the preseason pick to win the Southern Conference men's basketball title in separate voting by league coaches and media. 
Coaches selected Mocs guard Casey Jones as the preseason player of the year. The media did not vote for a player of the year. 
As for VMI, they have been picked to finished last in the 10-team conference, entering their second season in the SoCon. The Keydets are coming off an 11-19 overall mark last year, and a 7-11 record in conference. 
VMI junior guard Q.J. Peterson was named to the Southern Conference Preseason All-Conference team for the second-straight year. 
Chattanooga received seven first-place votes and 78 points from coaches, who were not allowed to vote for their teams or players. 
Right behind the Mocs in balloting was two-time defending conference Wofford followed by Mercer, East Tennessee and Furman. 
SoCon media had the same top five teams in their vote. 
Jones and Chattanooga teammate Justin Tuoyo were picked for the coaches' 10-member preseason all-conference team.
